title: FacetComponent throws NPE when using shards.tolerant and a shard fails to respond
description:
When using shards.tolerant distributed search, and some shards fail to respond, FacetComponent.handleResponses() throws NPE.

This is similar to SOLR-6223: add distributed support, fixed in 4.10.

comments.author: Ran Peled
comments.content: This is the same bug, this time in the FacetComponent.
